body_html:
the tag stopped working because the eigen mirror on github moved (it was one of the submodules).

Hence we were forced to re-tag.

Ironically, we had to re-tag because folks could no longer build wheels on that tag.

See this for context: #7793
body_text:
the tag stopped working because the eigen mirror on github moved (it was one of the submodules).
Hence we were forced to re-tag.
Ironically, we had to re-tag because folks could no longer build wheels on that tag.
See this for context: #7793
body:
the tag stopped working because the eigen mirror on github moved (it was one of the submodules).


Hence we were forced to re-tag.

Ironically, we had to re-tag because folks could no longer build wheels on that tag.

See this for context: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7793
